articleName: Spy X Family renewed for 2nd season and movie.
articleDesc: The popular family rom-com anime has been renewed for a second season and movie that will hit theaters.

articleName: Chainsaw Man's first season has finished.
articleDesc: The latest hit bloody and action-packed shonen anime, Chainsaw Man, has finished its first season.

articleName: Attack On Titan's final arc will be releasing in parts.
articleDesc: On route to ending, the epic shonen's final arc is set to be releasing in parts based on MAPPA confirmation.

articleName: Demon Slayer's third season will release early in theaters.
articleDesc: The third season for the wildly popular shonen anime, Demon Slayer, will be shown early for movie theater goers.
The amazing journey of Mob Psycho 100 has came to a satisfying close as the run for its anime has offically ended.

articleName: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Stone Ocean ending explained.
articleDesc: We are here to explain the epic ending to JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Stone Ocean and whats in store next for JJBA.
